website_summaries.verdict: Buyers wanting a smaller option with multiple features will find their match in this portable pick.
pros: Includes two detached beer pong rafts for multiple gaming positions
Doubles as a social drink holder
High sides keep drinks from spilling
cons: Rafts tend to drift away easily

customer_reviews.title: Ok to Play - Dont forget to buy the mini cups for it!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I did not read the details. It does NOT come with the mini solo cups pictured. Overall it is fine and works in the pool just fine, stays afloat and we play. However, make sure you buy the mini cups to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Risse72

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for vacation in indo, plan on returning as soon as we return due to seam leakage that cause the floats to deflate fairly quickly. Was quick difficult to blow up. Cup holders are on the smaller end
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Tacky
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine and as advertised, but your packaging is appalling. Perhaps you are only trying to appeal to immature, misogynistic frat boys, but a giant close-up photo of a woman’s breast implants as your primary image is neither a classy way of doing business nor is it relevant to your product. Most of your box’s images were tacky, and I would not purchase one of your products again for that reason alone. I ordered this item for my children to enjoy a game in the pool without the inclusion of alcohol. I was mistaken, apparently. One star for selling a usable product. Class it up, GoFloats... I’m embarrassed for you.
customer_reviews.author: JayRob

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice and sturdy, holds up my portable speaker +my drinks lol also you can play the beer pong part of it. 9/10 I had a hand pump assist me in blowing it up, I would suggest the same but you can blow it up by mouth in a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pool purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent. Bought this sort of as a gag for my boyfriend and I to use in the new pool. Had a blast with it, and his kids had a great time as well (we used water in the cups just in case, so we didn't end up with beer spilled in the pool). Standard solo cups fit snug, and the free floating nature of these things upped the difficulty and hilarity of playing beer pong in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha E.

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool game!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member who just got a home with a pool! Having in the water definitely makes it more challenging but hey that just makes it more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Summer!
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea, but it would be nice if there was some kind of hook on these things so you could tie a string to them and anchor them somehow because they keep floating away.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design! Just get out of the pool and play a real game! Cool concept but not good!
customer_reviews.author: ben woods

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the party
customer_reviews.text: This was the biggest impact item at pool party with friends. Everyone wants to play! Add these to take your pool party up a notch. Bonus feature: When you're not playing, they are floating drink holders! Great bang for buck, can't wait to use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Pool fun
customer_reviews.text: It's fun. We make up our own rules. I did Google the rules of real beer pong to get a base idea. Sometimes the solo cups crack when you force them into the holders.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my son's 41st birthday.l He is going to see a buddy in Florida soon and I thought it would be fun if he brought a cool game with him. He loves it and is looking forward to using it in his friend's pool.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Poler

customer_reviews.title: Great for the game or use as a water cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a water cooler in a pool. It has perfect size cup holders. Just throw a little ice in there with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Super fun game
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game. Works both in the water and resting on a table. Super worth it, I'm glad we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Brought them on vacation and was so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a fun pool game. Bought Christmas time. Only have one to use as the second came with a 2” cut in it. Box was not damaged, so damage was during manufacturing or packaging. Not happy. Don’t bother purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Ted G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lets just say my friends and family look forward to pool parties at our house!!!!!!!!!!!! Normal shipping time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think this one through when I purchased it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think this one through when I purchased it. Playing outside in a pool or lake there is going to be wind and waves and lots of movement. The balls are no heavier than regular ping pong balls, making this game much more difficult. Also needs anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Pool pong
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought these as the are really a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J. Coty

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn fun, even for kids
customer_reviews.text: Simple fun, but turns out also great for kids (w/o the booze of course). My friend's two kids made up all sorts of games having 2 of them made it easy for the game so be solo challenges). I had purchased a number of multicolored pingpong balls with the original purchase, so there could be lots of tossing about before scoring.
customer_reviews.author: Eelisa

customer_reviews.title: These were awesome! The guests at our pool party truly enjoyed ...
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome! The guests at our pool party truly enjoyed it! Unfortunately, someone popped a whole in one of the floating cup holders and the package did not come with a patch. :-/ Other than that, great product!! Truly lots of fun while it lasted. Now, to go buy a patch so we can continue to enjoy them! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: Hours and Days of fun was had by all
customer_reviews.text: Pool Pong was a big hit on vacation. These can be used for Pong, a floating drink tray, a card table for the hot tub and soooo much more. Hours and Days of fun was had by all. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: It's as expected
customer_reviews.text: Blows up easily, fits the cups, doesn't turn over. People just have to hold onto it when the other person is shooting.
customer_reviews.author: KristiC

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Ok for a bit, but turn it over and use it as a flat surface for drinking games. Hint waterproof cards
customer_reviews.author: adan p.

customer_reviews.title: Fun party or vacation game
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Boyfriend loved this on our vacation. Doubles as floating food and drink tray. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anne MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Get the Floating Table Instead.
customer_reviews.text: I'd probably recommend getting the single table type of pool BP instead of this since you have to hold the floaties stable to keep it fair.
customer_reviews.author: Twiddle Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: These are great - easy to inflate and good quality. It was a bit tough to get the cups in due to the plastic on plastic friction but at least then they will not fall out in the pool. It came with some ping pong balls as well which I didn't even realize.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Fun time in the pool
customer_reviews.text: It's a very entertaining flotation device. Had an entertaining couple of hours with this set. Would recommend this friends.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: If you have a pool, you need to purchase. Bought as a house warming gift for friends. Had so much fun playing, I turned around and bought one for my house pool. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: but i think the version where it is on the bed is better because these drift easily
customer_reviews.text: they are ok, but i think the version where it is on the bed is better because these drift easily. good for being cheap though
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Local

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun idea and fun to have for a party but doesn't stay always stay upright.
customer_reviews.author: scthompson

customer_reviews.title: These were great, and the entire resort in Mexico thought so ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great, and the entire resort in Mexico thought so too as there wasn't a moment where someone wasn't using them in the pool. They lasted the week long trip and stayed there. I'll definitely have to invest again when I go back.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah D

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cups don't fit well. Also, I would suggest adding some sort of weight to keep the float stationary while you're trying to play otherwise it just floats all over the place. Maybe that's the purpose but I didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Floating Beer Pong? It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about these. I thought who would want to play beer pong in the pool. Well as soon as our friends got in they wanted to play immediately. It was harder because the floats move around and makes it more fun to play. Needless to say it was the fun of the party all day! Best party purchase I ever made. That's my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Andres

customer_reviews.title: Kids like them, I guess they are OK Didn't see ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids like them, I guess they are OK Didn't see much use during the summer after the novilty wore off.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Collura

customer_reviews.title: Should be a great game!
customer_reviews.text: It is really difficult for the balls to get in the cups, frustrating and lost interest
customer_reviews.author: G. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for playing beerpong at the pool. They came in a little carton box with three little plastic balls. Not trynna state the obvios but they OF COURSE move while in the pool, so you should just be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: NataliaTA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mildew city! It's very difficult to dry out those holes. Ugghh
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Floating peer pong is awesome! Careful, because unless you hold on to them, they will float away. Playing in teams makes it super fun and more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: Great for a pool party!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before a trip to Cancun and I was the life of the party! Completely deflated them, threw them in a suitcase and brought them with me to a pool bar. Takes some time to inflate, but it's worth it! Great way to meet people since everyone else wants to join in!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable, stays inflated and holds the cups in place like a champ. Recommend setting the cup holders and cups to get them to slide in easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of them continually goes flat, can’t even use them.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.  Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone had a wonderful time using these beer pong floats. Easy to fill with air and easy to deflate when done. (I recommend using an air compressor if you have one. Makes blowing up these pool toys so much quicker).
customer_reviews.author: JW1970

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: We used these all summer long in the pool. You'll want to get extra cups and balls. Lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: A. Skaats

customer_reviews.title: Such a great game to play in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Such a great game to play in the pool. Just used last weekend on our group trip and had a blast. Going to be a staple all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: GidgetN

customer_reviews.title: Broken in mail!
customer_reviews.text: Came in the mail and one of the the triangles was already broken! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my sister and brother in law. We got one couple years past. Great fun for the pool. Recently took ours with us to our Florida vacation. Great for trips!!
customer_reviews.author: SUE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Plus it came with free ping pong balls which is always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia M Herman

customer_reviews.title: It works and is fun! The cups are very secure so won't tip
customer_reviews.text: It works and is fun! The cups are very secure so won't tip. Best thing is to use as a floating sidetable for a water raft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon mom

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality, wouldn’t stay inflated and barely could blow them up. Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Jon Graham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Everyone at our pool party loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tess R.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Can’t fit cups properly in the holes. It’s a struggle to get the cups in and out.
customer_reviews.author: megan leen

customer_reviews.title: More uses than a game!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot of fun in the pool! I also use them to hold my drink, cellphone & a snack while I'm in my pool! It's a win-win for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug2107

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of fun with this! Of course, someone from each team has to hold it steady, but as one party guest mentioned, there could be a multitude of "rules" when playing this game, to include letting them float around a bit!

customer_reviews.title: My friend uses it at her pool parties and it's always a lot of fun. Greatly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift. My friend uses it at her pool parties and it's always a lot of fun. Greatly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Missing pong balls
customer_reviews.text: The box said 3 pong balls included. There were never 3 pong balls included with the delivery of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach or pool.  Or just getting drunk and needing somewhere to set your drink(s).
customer_reviews.text: Total hit at my destination wedding! We ended up not using these for the game, but rather large floating drink trays. They held up to our craziness very well all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable use this stuff in the pool for drinks ( in the glass or in the bottle)

customer_reviews.title: Floats well and is pretty study.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. It was a hit! Floats well and is pretty study.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a hit everywhere we go! They are so fun and make a great floating cooler too!

customer_reviews.title: fun in the pool with beer.
customer_reviews.text: awesome. thats really all i can say. Was a lot of fun and I bought in conjunction with the ice rack that fit right inside to keep the beer cold. Fun product and everyone had fun playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the holes secure cups into place. They are slightly smaller than the red solo cup diameter. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Morales

customer_reviews.title: good idea, bad product
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would make for a lot of fun in the summer sun. i opened up the box, blew the first one up and was excited to get going. the second one would not fill. i blew it up only for it to deflate. i found that the seam on it was not properly melted together. i then decided, i was gonna play, i used gorilla tape on it and blew it up again. i was excited but only to be let down when another seam on the opposite side also wasnt sealed. its not the shippers fault, but the product is very cheaply made, find a better model than this one
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this for a "Redneck Pool Party" at a local ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a "Redneck Pool Party" at a local Lodge. The party and games, including the Pool Pong were a big hit!!!

customer_reviews.title: Floating cup holders
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much use these as floating cup holders for my drink, but they work REALLY well for that.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite pool game. It's great for all ages.

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box I had one that lost air, the cups are pretty hard to get in and out. Worked okay.

customer_reviews.title: Item as described. We have had a blast with ...
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. We have had a blast with these already this summer.

customer_reviews.text: Only one that allows you to move the pieces around, small in size so you aren't taking up a lot of space.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Used 1 for drink holder. Would order again!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: These were a great addition to a pool party we recently had! They were so much fun to play with!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a pool. They are a lot of fun

customer_reviews.title: Great idea...
customer_reviews.text: If you are not a heavy drinker; this is a great way to get started. Just set one up at the other end of your bath and every night you can knock back six beers...

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea
customer_reviews.text: Ayer fun for lake vacations. We played with water as to not pollute the lake with beer. You're welcome.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: We brought this with us on our family vacation and it served our purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Fun For less than 15 dollars
customer_reviews.text: These are great whether your playing pool pong or just using them to hold some cold ones. Not bad for the price either.

customer_reviews.title: great find
customer_reviews.text: A huge hit with my college aged son and his friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I also use it as a cooler that floats in the pool.

customer_reviews.title: Popped in a few days
customer_reviews.text: cheap quality - not worth the money at all - cannot leave in the pool either it loses color - what a shame
customer_reviews.author: Will Smith

customer_reviews.title: if you like throwing money out the window please buy this.
customer_reviews.text: If there was a "0" star rating I would post it. I bought one for me & gave one away as a birthday present. What a waste!! We blew hers up and with in an hour they were flat. I thought maybe it was just a fluke & went home & tried to us mine in our pool. Again, both of them went flat. What a waste of 40 bucks. I'm really surprised because I'm usually pleased with my Amazon purchases. I guess buying anything more from this particular company in the future is off limits for both me & my friend. Talk about feeling humiliated & cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty awesome, except if trying to play in the wind :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Beer Pong Set (Doubles as Floating Drink Holder)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the boat to occasionally play beer pong in the cove. They work great (imo). Yes, they float around independently unlike a normal table, but that makes it more challenging. And they're actually tall enough to adequately support cups with beer unlike some of the cheap inflatable beer pong tables I've seen. And best of all, my wife has realized that they make great floating drink holders. For the price, this is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sobczyk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a blast, 20 was a little pricey but fun
customer_reviews.author: VRBro's

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay in one place. Tends to float to one end of pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Beer pong and pool = awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: my title says it all! Best pool you for adults!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole.lp

customer_reviews.title: Cups don't fit - pool pong set
customer_reviews.text: Cups have a hard time fitting in the spots and the whole float holds a lot of water in the bottom. Even still, the whole thing floated real well and held bottles just fine. As a bottle holder this works well. Hopefully the holes for cups will stretch some with use. Easy to inflate, deflate and store. As others have said, these would be great attached so they stay the same distance apart. Overall happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kt Mae

customer_reviews.title: These are great. The only thing I wishower it had would ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The only thing I wishower it had would be a spot on the side so you can tie some rope to it. I like to use this on the river to hold my drinks and it would be better if there was some way to tiE and secure it. Otherwise I love this!
customer_reviews.author: kassie j barnes

customer_reviews.title: Save your breath -- doesn't stay inflated.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my son (for soda pong, not beer pong, let's be clear). Blew them up. One deflated almost immediately. Cant find any leak, but there's obviously one. Blew it up again, only to have it sink again. The other one has definitely lost a lot of air, but not as much as the other one. Disappointed -- not just in the product but that it was a bummer of a present to give a kid -- one that you can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are super neat! A fun game to play in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Niiice
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Shipped and received fast. Bigger then expected. A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Gives everyone a chance to win. I'm not very good but my husband is great at beer pong. Keeping it floating makes it more challenging and more up to luck. We have had lots of fun in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: officelover

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer easy to work with!
customer_reviews.text: When I received my Pool Pong Racks I inflated them and they immediately deflated. I looked at costumer reviews on Amazon and saw the manufacturer offered to replace them for another costumer. I contacted the manufacturer and they replaced my order, no questions asked. I got the second set a week or so later and had no problems with this set. Fun, fun!
customer_reviews.author: TobiN

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: hard to blow up and bigger than it looked on the website. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fe Janey

customer_reviews.title: Survived a Vegas bachelor party
customer_reviews.text: For a bachelor party in Vegas I was hoping it would just survive one use. It actually stood up to the heat for 3 days. It works pretty well, though any wind will make simple beer pong an even harder feat. Hopefully it blows up next year when I want to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: V. Broccoli

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun
customer_reviews.text: More challenging than regular beer pong! If someone moves in the water, the pong sets will float further away or closer to you! A great way to challenge your friends who think they are the best at pong!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Bee

product_meta.title: GoPong Pool Pong Rack Floating Beer Pong Set, Includes 2 Rafts and 3 Pong Balls, Blue
product_meta.description: Take your beer pong game into the water with the pool pong racks. The pool pong rack game consists of 2 floating islands with room for 6 cups each and have extra-high sidewalls to prevent cannonball sized waves from ruining your game. Provides a much more affordable alternative to the other floating tables out on the market. Design is also compatible with freezable racks to keep your beer cold under the sun. Can also be used as a floating drink holder when not being used for a game.
feature_bullets: FLOATING BEER PONG: Challenge guests to a rowdy round of beer pong at the next pool party with this handy floating game set
PARTY SET: Game includes 2 rafts, 3 balls, and rules which can be followed, rewritten, or ignored at leisure
SOCIAL FLOATING: Each floating islands has room for 6 cups and can be used as a drink holder when games aren't in session
WON'T TIP OVER: Extra-high sidewalls keep racks steady and prevent larger waves from ruining the game
UNIQUE GIFT: The perfect gift for anyone who enjoys drinking games and having a good time

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
